title: Good cleaning fun: housework down the years
creator_credit: TV Ed Productions, Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch, Bob Scarfe and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: An education officer from the Museum of Victoria looks at a number of “labour saving appliances” used in the home over the last one hundred and fifty years and looks at the development of laundry and kitchen appliances.
